amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Air Force aircraft procurement appropriation by $493 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 28, as amendment No. 10, to strike $493 million from the Air Force Aircraft Procurement Account. The intent of the amendment is to prevent funding for new production of additional B-2 stealth bombers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kasich amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 213 (Roll no. 639).
